segments.text: I see this cozy kitchen with sunlight streaming in from the window.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: There's an adult woman standing by the sink, carefully drying a plate with a towel.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She looks so focused on that plate, not noticing anything else.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water is running from the faucet, and the sink is overflowing onto the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: A puddle is forming right at her feet, and one of her shoes is already wet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's wearing an apron and a dress, like she's in the middle of everyday chores.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: To her left, there's a boy climbing on a little stool to reach the cookie jar in the cabinet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool looks wobbly, tilting back a bit.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's got one hand in the jar and the other holding a plate, probably to catch cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: A girl is standing nearby, reaching up with her hand open, waiting for her share.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They seem to be sneaking cookies while the woman isn't looking.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The garden outside the window looks so peaceful, with bushes and a path.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't believe the woman hasn't turned around yet.
segments.speaker: PAR
